about_the_game:
Over 80 hours of content if participating in the different difficulties casually
  • Over 10 hours from campaign per difficulty or 100 as there is 10 difficulties. different builds, Multiple Endings

    Character Creation !


    20! traits to which you select 2 per save or a total of 190 Combinations


    1 tutorial level, 22 Normal Levels , 4 Super levels and 3 Bonus Levels!


    Campaign Stat Tracking


  • Over 6 hours from Event Mode playing each level and difficulty once ~ 6 levels 3 difficulty's , open tech free challenge maps, raids


  • Over 6 hours from Strategic Ai Mode playing each level and difficulty once ~ 6 levels 3 difficulty's, open tech, raids, its like event mode but with an ai with special units trying to outplay you


  • Endless Replayability from Custom Battle Mode going up to 1000 rounds with all raid types and 10 difficulty's with many sandbox options


  • 23 Handcrafted Maps


  • Custom Unit Army Colors with over 625 colors to select for 4 different regions or 20 Hand Selected Presets


  • Custom Creative Mode Menu To Setup Mach Battles Or Test Fighting Scenarios which can be a cheat menu available in all modes


  • Statistic Tracker For Each Played Match


  • Full Xbox One Controller Compatible with QOL features for a true gamepad user including magnetization, Hotkeys, Manual movement And Location jumping


  • Updated Multiple Times Per Year
New Features & Content
Bug Fixs

  • Community Guided DLC/Features
DLC put out will be based on what the players want through community voting and discord discussions

  • Raid System

content_descriptors.notes: well its a tower defence game about a war between a religious country fights a corrupted country that had summoned demons to amass power and it backfired and the demons took it over and seek to destroy the world, and your the kingdom in its way. where each battle many units get spawned and die in pools of blood but also spawn lesser blood pools on hit with many types of units and weapons and magic, some units can eat you whole and some can convert your units into demons from their attacks or last hit converts.

short_description: The Crusade is Nigh Or TCIN is a game consisting of rpg, rts, and tower defense elements where you fight to control up to 5 lanes while trying to keep your base alive from enemy attacks using strategy & skill
